Title: 1. The French Connection

Title: 4. The Last Picture Show

filming_locations: ['605 South Ash Street, Archer City, Texas, USA']

Description: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.
filming_locations: ['Binsey Walk, Southmere Lake, Thamesmead South, London, England, UK']

Description: During the 1970s, car-delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time, but always runs into trouble.

Title: 19. Bushman
Description: In 1968's tumult, a Nigerian student in San Francisco experiences clashing cultures and elucidates society's ineptitude at living humanely.

Title: 20. Beware of a Holy Whore
Description: On a film set there are two things missing, the film material and the director. So the actors and actresses as well as the crew try to make the best out of the situation. When the director arrives the material is still missing and so they still wait and try to make the best out of the situation. When the material finally arrives all folks involved into the film find themselves in a weird situation. Jealousy, competition and despair are ruling. Nobody seems to be able to break through this atmosphere, so they all still try to make the best out of the situation, but this is probably not the way to finish the film.
filming_locations: ['Hotel Bellevue Syrene, Sorrento, Naples, Campania, Italy']
